page.title: 03WISBECH ST.MARY SCHOOL CONT.
page.content: Various clubs are held by teachers and parents after school hours. These include: Computer, gymnastics, dance, athletics,guitar, recorder and drama. P.T.A.- The Wisbech St. Mary P.T.A. was formed in the late l950's and has been an extremely active organisation ever since. It's main function has been to raise funds to be used for the benefit of the school and it's pupils. Recently the P.T.A. has attempted to establish the Summer Fair as a major village event including, fun-run, parade of floats and dog show. Over the last five years the Bonfire and Firework Display has become a major area event attracting upwards of 2,000 people. These and other smaller events have enabled the school to be supported to the tune of at least Â£2,000 per year.
